text1: An experimental weapon modification that does nothing on its own. When installed along with the necessary experimental hull mod, splits the slot its installed on into smaller ones. Refer to the Primary & Ancillary Data sections for further information.

An experimental weapon modification that does nothing on its own. When installed along with the necessary experimental hull mod, splits the slot its installed on into smaller ones. Refer to the Primary & Ancillary Data sections for further information.
